metadata.title: Why Is TS3 Not Outputting "L" at Port Initialization?

sections.content:
Question:
Why is TS3 not outputting "L" at port initialization when Capacitive Touch Kit RX113 running in Workbench6?
Answer:
This problem of TS3 terminal not outputting "L" when RX113 is used has been confirmed in Workbench6 Ver.1.05.00.00 or earlier.
The problem has been solved in Ver.1.06.00.00 and later, so please use the post-resolution version.
Workbench6 is now in maintenance status, and we do not plan to update it in the future.
Use QE for Capacitive Touch as a support tool for developing a modern capacitive touch sensor.
QE for Capacitive Touch can be downloaded from URL below.
https://www.renesas.com/qe-capacitive-touch
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
